topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541f69b46368724284340000#post_541f69b46368724284340000
Tl:dr; Moot's become a social justice warrior and is banning everyone that he considers a "nerd", he threw out all the old mods and replaced them with SJW, the new mods are banning everyone that talks about "Gamergate":http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/events/gamergate they're attacking /b/, /v/, attacking furries, attacking anime fans and attacking bronies, moot is planning on doxxing everyone that isn't a social justice warrior and is planning on turning it into the cathedral for social justice warriors.  Everyone's had enough of moot's SJW shit so everyone's just moving to 8chan instead.

Tl:dr; welcome to *NEW* 4chan:
[spoiler]!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/832/425/bf0.png![/spoiler]
